::DrillBit::

Now at the base, DrillBit climbed through the hatch, and then helped
Dollen and GoldenEye through. He helped carry Dollen to the CR tank.
"Here we are." He said, lifting the bot into the tank.
He then ran back to KitKat.
"Honey, do you want to talk?" He asked.
